description: Try our easy to follow Barilla Spaghetti Amatriciana With Basilico Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Barilla Spaghetti Amatriciana With Basilico Sauce
name: Barilla Spaghetti Amatriciana With Basilico Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Once the Spaghetti is cooked al dente, drain, and toss in a frying pan with the sauce. Finish with a handful of grated Pecorino cheese.
